posts.title: Top 5 Tips for Writing Clean Code
posts.author: Sara Rezai
posts.content: Writing clean code is crucial for maintainable software. Here are 5 tips: 1. Use meaningful names. 2. Keep functions short. 3. Avoid deep nesting. 4. Write comments wisely. 5. Refactor regularly.
